item.title: CVE-2022-33705|2024-08-03T08:09:22.284Z -- samsung%20mobile -- calendar
item.description: Information exposure in Calendar prior to version 12.3.05.10000 allows attacker to access calendar schedule without READ_CALENDAR permission.
